about_the_game:
Test your wit and strategy in Everglyph Trials, a roguelite deck builder with ever-evolving choices and challenges.
Build your deck from a variety of cards, each with a unique combination of effects. Unleash devastating combos and adapt your tactics to defeat powerful floor bosses.

Key Features

  • Strategic Deckbuilding: Make key card choices throughout your journey, crafting a deck to overcome difficult encounters. Experiment with combos and adapt your strategy as the battlefield evolves.
  • Dual Card Effects: Every card offers two impactful options: a play effect and a reveal effect. Analyze enemies and their intentions to execute winning strategies. Will you risk high-rolling for damage this turn or set up the perfect kill for the next?

  • Synergy and Buffs: Play cards from the same elemental faction to unlock bonus effects like multicasting and stacking buffs. Unlock each hero’s potential through purposeful cardplay.
  • Ever-Changing Depths: Each run is unique. Explore procedurally generated levels, encounter diverse enemies with deadly skills, and discover powerful glyphs that alter your fate.

  • A World of Magic and Beauty: Immerse yourself in a stunning hand-drawn fantasy world. Explore breathtaking landscapes, face fantastic foes, and uncover its secrets.
  • The Roguelite Challenge Awaits: Test your skills. Each run offers a chance to learn, unlock permanent upgrades, and forge a path to victory.
  • Hardcore Mode: Optionally increase the difficulty by venturing deeper into the trials or adding restrictions for even greater rewards.
